note: I accept all that I am, right here, right now in this moment. Nothing can stop you and nothing can make you! Dancing Abundance Explorer and a Gaia Scenic.

name: Self-Acceptance.
value: I accept all that I AM, right here, right now in this Now moment.

name: Self-Responsibility.
value: I accept full self-responsibility for my life and my situation.  If I want to change something in my life, I will do what is necessary each moment, each moment, each moment.  Now...

name: Compassion.
value: I have Unconditional Love and Compassion For All in this Time of Great Disclosure and Awakening.

name: Values/Beliefs, Thoughts, Feelings, Words, Actions and Intentions.
value: This is cause and effect.   All these things together form a vibrational package which draws into your life matching Be-ings, situations, experiences and things.  Only I AM responsible and can control what vibrational package I align with.
